alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 5:26PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Gulf, east central Bay and southwestern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 600 PM EDT/500 PM CDT/... At 526 PM EDT/426 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles north of Stonemill Creek to 8 miles northeast of Mexico Beach. Movement was northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kinard and Broad Branch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf
